source.query:
SELECT
CollectionListUsage."cdcollijst",
CollectionListUsage."cddeb",
CollectionListLines."cdprodukt",
CollectionListLines."cdstandeenhd",
Products."Omschr-35",
ProductUnits."cduac",
Substr(AssortmentProducts."cdblok", 2, 1) Depricated,
Substr(AssortmentProducts."cdblok", 7, 1) Blocked
FROM
"PUB"."lb-202" CollectionListUsage,
"PUB"."lb-203" CollectionListLines,
"PUB"."bb-040" Products,
"PUB"."lb-180" AssortmentProducts,
"PUB"."bb-051" ProductUnits
WHERE
CollectionListUsage."cdadmin" = '10' AND AssortmentProducts."cdadmin" = '10'
AND CollectionListUsage."cdcollijst" = CollectionListLines."cdcollijst"
AND CollectionListLines."cdprodukt" = Products."cdprodukt"
AND CollectionListLines."cdstandeenhd" = ProductUnits."cdstandeenhd"
AND CollectionListLines."cdprodukt" = ProductUnits."cdprodukt"
AND CollectionListLines."cdstandeenhd" = AssortmentProducts."cdstandeenhd"
AND CollectionListLines."cdprodukt" = AssortmentProducts."cdprodukt"
